name: Asian Clicker
description:
Features!

Buy and sell Coal!

This is Asian Clicker. This is a small project I did in  Winforms so its very limited. I was just experimenting and this is all just for fun! I hope you enjoy this little game I made. This will be getting no new updates since I want to work on other projects
